text: Nake mũthamaki ũcio wa Suriata akĩmũcookeria atĩrĩ, “Geria ũthiĩ. Nĩngũtũmĩra mũthamaki wa Isiraeli5:5 Joramu nĩwe warĩ mũthamaki wa Isiraeli. marũa.” Nĩ ũndũ ũcio Naamani akiumagara na agĩkuua taranda ikũmi5:5 nĩ ta kilo 340 cia betha, na cekeri 6,0005:5 nĩ ta kilo 70 cia thahabu, na nguo cia magarũrĩra ikũmi.
